name: Bitsy Momokoi
description:
Momokoi

This project is for a class assignment in Game Production. I had one week and had to use a program called Bitsy. In addition to Bity's limitations, I was also limited to only use ZX Spectrum colors. 
This is a short game based off a text based roleplay chat I made with my friends called Minima. In the game, a creature blocks your path. You go around collecting plants and talking to npcs until you are able to slay the creature.
